Ribbiting Tale of a Lily Pad Labour Dispute, The
translation: スイレンの葉の労働争議物語

english: The Ribbiting Tale of a Lily Pad Labour Dispute
translation: スイレンの葉の労働争議物語

english: Solve a ribbiting dispute and gain access to a new Hardwood Farming Patch.

translation: ウォーターフィーンド
アンデッド・ドルイド

english: Automatically smash Gargoyles when they're on critical health, if you have the right tool.
Automatically salt Rockslugs when they're on critical health, if you have salt.
Automatically freeze Desert Lizards when they're on critical health, if you have ice water.
Automatically spray Mutated Zygomites when they're on critical health, if you have fungicide.
Learn to combine the protective Slayer headgear and Slayer gem into one universal helmet, with level 55 Crafting.
Learn to craft your own Slayer Rings, with level 75 Crafting.
Learn to fletch broad arrows (with level 52 Fletching), broad bolts (with level 55 Fletching) and amethyst broad bolts (with level 76 Fletching).
Whenever you get a Dark Beast task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get an Ankou task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Suqah task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Black Dragon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Bronze, Iron or Steel Dragon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Spiritual Creature task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get an Abyssal Demon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Black Demon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Greater Demon task, it will be a bigger task.
Konar, Duradel and Nieve will be able to assign Red Dragons as your task.
Konar, Duradel and Nieve will be able to assign Mithril Dragons as your task.
Konar, Duradel, Nieve, Chaeldar and Krystilia will be able to assign Aviansies as your task.
Duradel, Nieve and Chaeldar will be able to assign TzHaar as your task. You may also be offered a chance to slay TzTok-Jad or TzKal-Zuk.
Konar, Duradel, Nieve and Krystilia will be able to assign boss monsters as your task. They will choose which boss you must kill.
Whenever you get a Bloodveld task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get an Aberrant Spectre task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get an Aviansie task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Mithril Dragon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Cave Horror task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Dust Devil task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Skeletal Wyvern task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Gargoyle task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Nechryael task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Cave Kraken task, it will be a bigger task.
Konar, Duradel, Nieve and Chaeldar will be able to assign you Lizardmen.
Learn how to combine a KBD head with your Slayer helmet to colour it black.
Learn how to combine a Kalphite Queen head with your Slayer helmet to colour it green.
Learn how to combine an Abyssal Demon head with your Slayer helmet to colour it red.
Learn how to combine a Dark Claw with your Slayer helmet to colour it purple.
Increase the risk against certain Slayer monsters with the chance of a superior version spawning whilst on a Slayer task.
Whenever you get a Scabarite task, it will be a bigger task.
Mithril Dragons drop mithril bars in banknote form while killed on assignment.
Whenever you get a Fossil Island Wyvern task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get an Adamant Dragon task, it will be a bigger task.
Whenever you get a Rune Dragon task, it will be a bigger task.
Learn how to combine Vorkath's head with your Slayer helmet to colour it turquoise.
Stops you getting Fossil Island Wyvern tasks, without counting towards your blocked task limit.
Slaying Dusk and Dawn now counts for two kills towards your task rather than one.
Learn how to combine a Hydra head with your Slayer helmet to theme it like the Alchemical Hydra.
Whenever you get a Basilisk task, it will be a bigger task.
Konar, Duradel and Nieve will be able to assign Basilisks as your task.
Learn how to combine Twisted Horns with your Slayer helmet to theme it like the Great Olm.
Whenever you get a Vampyre task, it will be a bigger task.
Konar, Duradel, Nieve and Chaeldar will be able to assign Vampyres as your task.
Gain the ability to store your task, allowing you to take it at a later point in time.
Krystilia will be able to assign Jellies, Dust Devils, Nechryaels and Abyssal Demons as your task.
Whenever you get a Revenants task, it will be a bigger task.
Konar, Duradel, Nieve and Chaeldar will be able to assign Warped Creatures as your task.
Uncover knowledge about the Staff of Armadyl.
Reveal further knowledge about the Staff of Armadyl.
Return the Shield of Arrav to the museum.
Provide a diagram of the Observatory to the museum.
Provide information about King Arthur to the museum.
Describe Silverlight for a museum display.
Give information about the Gnome gliders to the museum.
Uncover information about Bob the cat.
Discover knowledge about King Lathas and his ancestors.
Provide information about the River Salve.
Uncover further information about the River Salve.
Delve into the story of the Carnillean family.
Find out about the cult of chaos mages near Varrock.
Discover the secrets of the Shield of Arrav.
Build the sabre toothed squirrel display.
Build part of the leviathan display.
Clean finds from the Digsite on the tables in the museum and place them in their cases.
Examine the displays in the Natural History section of the museum and answer Orlando Smith's quiz.
Gather information from around Gielinor by completing quests and other activities, then speak to Historian Minas.
Discover fossils on fossil island to complete the displays on the bottom floor of the museum.
Crush Barronite deposits in the ruins of Camdozaal to find relics and hand them in to the curator.
